dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm
dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.

dependencies.name: py-cached-property
dependencies.description: A decorator for caching properties in classes.

dependencies.name: py-clustershell
dependencies.description:
Scalable cluster administration Python framework - Manage node sets node
groups and execute commands on cluster nodes in parallel.

dependencies.name: py-cookiecutter
dependencies.description:
A command-line utility that creates projects from cookiecutters (project
templates). E.g. Python package projects, jQuery plugin projects.

dependencies.name: py-jinja2
dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.

dependencies.name: py-mock
dependencies.description:
mock is a library for testing in Python. It allows you to replace parts
of your system under test with mock objects and make assertions about
how they have been used.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description:
NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
It contains among other things: a powerful N-dimensional array object,
sophisticated (broadcasting) functions, tools for integrating C/C++ and
Fortran code, and useful linear algebra, Fourier transform, and random
number capabilities

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-python-magic
dependencies.description:
A python wrapper for libmagic. This project is named python-magic but
imports as the module name "magic".
